com.netflix.spectator.placeholders

Interface TagFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantTagFactory, MdcTagFactory

    public interface TagFactory
    A factory for producing tag values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.netflix.spectator.api.Tag createTag()
      Produces a tag based on the runtime context available to the factory.
      static TagFactory from(java.lang.String name, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> value)
      Helper method for creating a tag factory that uses a lambda to supply the value.
      java.lang.String name()
      Returns the name of the factory, which is used as the key for any Tag produced by the createTag method.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        static TagFactory from(java.lang.String name,
                       java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.String> value)
        Helper method for creating a tag factory that uses a lambda to supply the value.
        Parameters:
        name - Key to use for the returned tag value.
        value - Supplier used to retrieve the value for the tag. If the return value is null, then a null tag is returned an the dimension will be suppressed.
        Returns:
        Factory for producing tags using the value supplier.

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        Returns the name of the factory, which is used as the key for any Tag produced by the createTag method.

      • createTag

        com.netflix.spectator.api.Tag createTag()
        Produces a tag based on the runtime context available to the factory.
        Returns:
        the appropriate tag given the available context data, possibly null
